title: The day when Robert Downey Jr hinted at a Doctor Who appearance and Crystal Castles split up | Culture | The Guardian
summary: breaking news : crystal castles are no more .
let 's get serious for a minute .
if you thought the uncle buck tv show was terrible .

documents.title: re-cap and go-go
text: that 's yer lot for today , i 'll leave you with a recap of what we managed to learn today : there 's an under-watched ty 90s cultural critique of twin peaks knocking about on youtube featuring paul morley and suzanne moore .
we learned that the uncle buck tv show was utter dross , and the new one probably will be too .
crystal castle broke up and no-one really cared .
oh , yeah and robert downey jr might be on doctor who in the future .
let 's end on a theory from louis ck louis c.k .
( @ louisck ) it really feels like mars used to be a here that got globally warmed by some very us-y people-things .
louis c.k .
( @ louisck ) i 'm not saying i can prove it .
i 'm saying it feels like it .
louis c.k .
( @ louisck ) it feels like they left mars on a moon that they pushed out of orbit and rode over here to try to orbit what was earth louis c.k .
( @ louisck ) that 's the only way you could move billions of people-y types .
but their moon crashed into pre-earth and everyone died .
louis c.k .
( @ louisck ) what was left turned into here and our moon and got seeded by marsian corpse dna .
and later we 'll use our moon to go back .
louis c.k .
( @ louisck ) that 's what it feels like anyway .
louis c.k .
( @ louisck ) and it feels like we are gon na keep bopping around on moons til we realize the whole solar system is actually a spaceship .
louis c.k .
( @ louisck ) the sun is the engine and if you wait til it all lines up just right and you push `` go '' you can ride it to a bigger far place .
night .

documents.title: what to do this evening
text: avoid this bloke , go see something live .

mckay / rex features it 's wednesday night , if you do n't fancy stopping in to watch the itvbe launch - during which every essex celebrity ever ( joe swash , mark wright and denis van outen ) will be pushed in front of a camera and forced to speak mouth words - there 's always the option to go out and see something in the flesh or on the big screen .
here 's a run down of good stuff if you 're in london the bfi film festival starts tonight and lethal bizzle is at xoyo , ec1 .
if you 're in plymouth you could head to the theatre royal for scott graham 's version of othello .
if that sounds too cultured then you could try sylvan esso who 's in belfast tonight .
so there you go stay in an suffer essex overload or go out and hear a grime mc sing songs about working out in a supercar .

documents.title: breaking news : crystal castles are no more
text: something was obviously not quite right .
farrell agency / rex featu sorry to do this to all you nu-rave die hards but crystal castles have split .
alice glass has left the duo posting this on twitter : right , as you were .

documents.title: let 's get serious for a minute
text: amid the board games and the incessant uncle buck chat there are some serious things happening .
our own film previewer steve rose has written a great piece breaking down the propaganda of isis .
here 's a sample : just as islamic state ( isis ) has used captured american artillery against its enemies in iraq , so it is using the west 's media tools and techniques against it .
isis has proved fluent in youtube , twitter , instagram , tumblr , internet memes ( see : # catsofjihad ) and other social media .

amateur videos and images are also being uploaded daily by its footsoldiers , which are then globally disseminated , both by ordinary users and mainstream news organisations hungry for images of a conflict their own cameras can not access .
a recent example was a recruitment video consisting of edited footage from grand theft auto .
your games which are producing from you , we do the same actions in the battlefields ! !
[ sic ] '' proclaimed the youtube clip , which was duly reported around the world .
weighty but intriguing stuff , and on a similar note there 's a webchat with the elvis of philosophy '' slavoj zizek happening right now .
have a look and then come back , yeah ?

documents.title: if you thought the uncle buck tv show was terrible
text: paul daniels obviously was n't a fan /channel five/pa have a look at the vanilla ice board game which jimmy fallon dug up , along with a sinking of the titanic game during a 'rubbish board games ' segment of his show .

documents.title: when edgar met pharrell
text: following on from the news that edgar wright had directed the video for pharrell 's gust of wind video , the behatted one posted this bromantic their partnership might seem about as likely as kubrick shooting a video for status quo but the result - which we first posted yesterday - is pretty decent and features the daft punk helmets reimagined as weird floaty spaceships .

documents.title: new tunes : deerhoof , bc kingdom , rome fortune
text: here are the shiny new tracks currently filling the guide desk 's lugholes on this chilly wednesday : deerhoof - last fad oh deerhoof , you magnificently odd lot .
never .
change .
last fad 's the first release from their 12th - wait , what ?
twelfth ? !
- studio album la isla bonita , and is exactly the sort of jittery lo-fi noise pop you 'd expect from them .
[ note : the 30 seconds of guitar noodling at the start of that video is n't actually part of the song , though it could quite easily be . ]
bc kingdom - colours on the other end of the spectrum is the new bc kingdom track , which features absolutely no guitar noodling at all .
minimalist smoothie rnb is the order of the day here .
very nice it is too .

rome fortune - small vvorld [ full album ] finally here 's the free new album from atlanta rapper rome fortune , for which he 's assembled a murderer 's row of ace producers , including four tet and guide fave suicideyear .

documents.title: pass the buck
text: tv 's obsession with remaking 90s films that were actually just fine as they were , thank you very much , continues .
the latest ?

uncle buck , the john hughes comedy where a slovenly man-child has to adjust to the rigours of adult life ( basically the template for every judd apatow film ever ) , which abc are said to be circling like a hungry hyena .
uncle buck has actually has been remade for tv before , in the early 90s , and was a bit of a disaster , by all accounts : this remake/reboot/resurrection looks similarly misguided , if you ask me .
unless , abc are using the uncle buck horror trailer as their source material , in which case i 'm fully on board :

documents.title: rdj 4 dw ?
text: it 's been a busy 24 hours for robert downey jr , who first confirmed on the ellen degeneres show that he 's in talks for a fourth iron man film , and then went on to do an ama for reddit .

there were plenty of entertaining tidbits ( val kilmer almost died on the set of kiss kiss bang bang , he likes cats more than dogs ) , but perhaps most interesting of all was his answer to a question on whether he 'd ever appear in doctor who : it 's funny you 'd bring that up .
a writer asked me to watch a particular episode about a month ago , in hopes of helping us break story on a project .
an incredible series .
anything 's possible .
so there you have it : robert downey jr might be on doctor who at some undetermined point in the future .
but who would he play ?
the timelord himself is probably out of the question , but i can definitely see rdj in the role of some nefarious victorian factory owner who actually turns out to actually be a space slug .
or something .
anyway , here 's the trailer for this week 's who , which by all accounts is quite a scary one :

documents.title: the last post on twin peaks for a while , hopefully
text: on yesterday 's liveblog , sam declared that we have reached 'peak twin peaks ' .

but that was before we unearthed this cracking video from 1990 of the guardian 's suzanne moore and pretentiousness 's paul morley trying to get their heads around david lynch 's seminal series on the late show ( along with verity lambert , who helped create the original doctor who ) .
morley loves it , moore does n't see what the fuss is about , and reckons julian clary 's as good as lynch .
meanwhile , new york magazine have ranked all 117 of the jumpers worn on the show .
now we 've reached 'peak peaks ' .

bulletin.text: Welcome to the jungle, we've got fun and games.
Yes, we're on another pop culture safari, keeping an eye out for the best tunes, trailers and tittle tattle.
Today's big beasts include: Robert Downey Jr, Twin Peaks and Uncle Buck.
